ygData.subject: OT: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: At 01:54 PM 5/20/99 -0500, you wrote:  ...  ... Just wanted to comment that my other character is an enchanter, and I seriously have to disagree
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:54 PM 5/20/99 -0500, you wrote:
<snip>
>POOR at lower levels:
>
>Enchanters, wizards.
<snip>
>Classes like enchanters and wizards are rewarded for their initially tough
>experiences by sheer power later on. Classes like warriors who RULE
>early, on the other hand, pay for it later.

Just wanted to comment that my other character is an enchanter, and I
seriously have to disagree here. I have NEVER grouped, soloed the entire
way, and have levelled about twice as fast as my Bard.
Enchanters start to suck at higher levels, because the resistance system is
messed up, so enchanters are getting large numbers of resists vs. green
creatures currently.

Just my two cp


Talies the Wanderer
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
